alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 8:47PM EDT until August 04 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Grady County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 847 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Bainbridge, or near Bainbridge, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, Cairo, Whigham, West Bainbridge, Attapulgus, Climax, Brinson, Hanover, Capel, Rocky Hill, Recovery, Decatur Co A/P, Laingkat, Calvary, Jinks, Princes Still, Peoples Still, Amsterdam, Nickleville and Akridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
